TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCachePolicy extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含可以設定快取特定 HTTP 標頭，以及控制 ASP.NET 網頁輸出快取的方法。

span.span: Contains methods for setting cache-specific HTTP headers and for controlling the ASP.NET page output cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 背景資訊關於 HTTP 標頭以及控制快取，請參閱 RFC 2616:超文字傳輸通訊協定，HTTP/1.1，位於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For background information about HTTP headers and controlling caching, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddValidationCallback (System.Web.HttpCacheValidateHandler handler, object data);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddValidationCallback(class System.Web.HttpCacheValidateHandler handler, object data) cil managed
Public Sub AddValidationCallback (handler As HttpCacheValidateHandler, data As Object)

span.span: The value.

param.name: data
param.span: 傳回 委派 (Delegate) 的使用者提供的自定資料。

span.span: The arbitrary user-supplied data that is passed back to the delegate.

summary.span: 註冊目前回應的驗證回呼。

span.span: Registers a validation callback for the current response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一個機制來回應傳回給用戶端的輸出快取之前，請檢查以程式設計方式在快取的回應。The method provides a mechanism to check the response programmatically in the cache before the response is returned to the client by the output cache. 從 Web 伺服器快取提供回應之前，所有註冊處理常式會查詢以確保資源的有效性。Before the response is served from the Web server cache, all registered handlers are queried to ensure resource validity. 如果任何處理常式會設定旗標，指出快取的回應無效，項目會標示為不正確，並取回，從快取。If any handler sets a flag indicating that the cached response is not valid, the entry is marked as not valid and expelled from the cache. 在此情況下，做為任何處理常式指出，應該忽略快取的回應，此要求，要求時以及再處理一樣快取遺漏。In this case, as well as when any handler indicates that the cached response should be ignored for this request, the request is then handled as if it were a cache miss. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將委派來驗證要求，根據查詢字串值。The following code example demonstrates how to add a delegate to validate a request based on query string values. [!code-aspx-csharp[Cache Validation Callback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache validation callback/CS/ValidationCallbackcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Cache Validation Callback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache validation callback/VB/ValidationCallbackvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The specified is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AppendCacheExtension(string extension) cil managed

param.name: extension
param.span: 要附加到 標頭的文字。

span.span: The text to append to the header.

summary.span: 將指定的文字附加至 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Appends the specified text to the HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果快取控制指示詞或延伸模組無法辨識的瀏覽器，瀏覽器必須忽略無法辨識的詞彙。If the browser does not recognize cache control directives or extensions, the browser must ignore the unrecognized terms. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2616:超文字傳輸通訊協定，HTTP/1.1，位於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用支援的 Internet Explorer 快取控制項擴充功能。The following code example demonstrates the use of a cache-control extension supported by Internet Explorer. 伺服器會指出瀏覽器內容不會變更為 1 小時 (`pre-check=3600`)，並指示它直接從本機快取擷取內容。The server is indicating to the browser that the content will not change for one hour (`pre-check=3600`) and instructs it to retrieve the content directly from the local cache. 不過，如果內容由伺服器和修改頁面使用者所要求的 15 分鐘內 (`post-check= 900`) 到一小時期間的瀏覽器會顯示在本機快取中找到的資訊，但是也會執行背景檢查和選用的提取在伺服器上的新內容。However, if the content is modified by the server and the page is requested by the user within a fifteen-minute (`post-check= 900`) to one-hour period, the browser displays the information found in the local cache but also performs a background check and optional fetch of the new content on the server. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.AppendCacheExtension Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory(bool allow) cil managed

param.name: allow
param.span: 表示讓用戶端瀏覽器將回應儲存在 [History] 資料夾中，否則為 。

span.span: to direct the client browser to store responses in the History folder; otherwise .
The default is .

summary.span: 當 參數為 時，讓回應在用戶端瀏覽器記錄快取中可用，而不考慮伺服器上的 設定。

span.span: Makes the response is available in the client browser History cache, regardless of the setting made on the server, when the parameter is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為或是 `Expires` HTTP 標頭是預設設定為-1，這會告知用戶端來快取回應不在歷程記錄 資料夾中，如此當您使用後/向前按鈕，用戶端要求的新版本每次回應。When is set to or the `Expires` HTTP header is by default set to -1; this tells the client not to cache responses in the History folder, so that when you use the back/forward buttons the client requests a new version of the response each time. 您可以藉由呼叫覆寫這個行為方法`allow`參數設為`true`。You can override this behavior by calling the method with the `allow` parameter set to `true`. 如果以外的其他設定為值或是，則呼叫方法的其中一個值`allow`沒有任何作用。If is set to values other than or , calling the method with either value for `allow` has no effect. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法來將回應儲存在自訂其歷程記錄中將用戶端導向。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to direct the client to store the responses in its history in a custom . [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory/CS/httpcachepolicy_setallowresponseinbrowserhistorycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory/VB/httpcachepolicy_setallowresponseinbrowserhistoryvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 設定 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header.

summary.span: HTTP 標頭控制文件如何在網路上進行快取。

span.span: The HTTP header controls how documents are to be cached on the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定`Cache-Control`標頭的列舉值`no-cache`。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `Cache-Control` header to the enumerated value for `no-cache`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig instance void SetCacheability(valuetype System.Web.HttpCacheability cacheability, string field) cil managed
Public Sub SetCacheability (cacheability As HttpCacheability, field As String)

param.name: cacheability
param.span: 要設定標頭的目標 列舉值。

param.name: field
param.span: 加入標頭的快取控制項擴充功能。

span.span: The cache control extension to add to the header.

summary.span: 將 標頭設定為其中一個 值，並且附加擴充功能到指示詞。

span.span: Sets the header to one of the values of and appends an extension to the directive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位名稱延伸模組是與搭配使用時才有效`private`或`no-cache`指示詞。The field name extension is valid only when used with the `private` or `no-cache` directives. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2616:超文字傳輸通訊協定，HTTP/1.1，位於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 如果結合了不相容的指示詞和延伸模組，則這個方法會擲回無效的引數例外狀況。This method will throw an invalid argument exception if incompatible directives and extensions are combined. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何`Cache-Control`標頭設定為 列舉值`private`，並將快取控制項擴充功能。The following code example demonstrates how the `Cache-Control` header is set to the enumeration value `private` and adds a cache-control extension. 修改過的指示詞表示，除了任何非共用快取中，只能由名為"DEV"的社群成員所共用的任何快取可能會快取回應。The modified directive means that in addition to any non-shared cache, any cache shared only by members of the community named "DEV" may cache the response. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

is not or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetETag(string etag) cil managed

span.span: The text to use for the header.

summary.span: 將 HTTP 標頭設定為指定的字串。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header to the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ETag`標頭是特定版本的文件的唯一識別碼。The `ETag` header is a unique identifier for a specific version of a document. 它被用戶端用來驗證用戶端快取的內容，以避免再次要求它。It is used by clients to validate client-cached content to avoid requesting it again. 一次`ETag`標頭是將它設定為 失敗的設定，後續的嘗試並擲回例外狀況。Once an `ETag` header is set, subsequent attempts to set it fail and an exception is thrown. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定`ETag`為某個自訂值的標頭。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `ETag` header to a custom value. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETag Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
The header has already been set.
-or-
The has already been called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetETagFromFileDependencies() cil managed

summary.span: 根據處理常式檔案相依性的時間戳記，設定 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header based on the time stamps of the handler's file dependencies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定`ETag`擷取所在的所有檔案的處理常式是相依的上次修改的時間戳記，將所有的檔案名稱和時間戳記結合成單一字串，然後在雜湊成是單一摘要的該字串的標頭做為`ETag`。The method sets the `ETag` header by retrieving the last modified time stamps of all files on which the handler is dependent, combining all file names and time stamps into a single string, then hashing that string into a single digest that is used as the `ETag`. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定`ETag`標頭。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `ETag` header. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetETagFromFileDependencies Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The header has already been set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetExpires(valuetype System.DateTime date) cil managed

param.name: date
param.span: 絕對 值，用以設定 標頭。

span.span: The absolute value to set the header to.

summary.span: 將 HTTP 標頭設定為絕對日期和時間。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header to an absolute date and time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 到期日違反限制性的原則，這個方法將會失敗。This method will fail if the expiration date violates the principle of restrictiveness. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將到期時間設為 下午 6:00The following code example demonstrates how to set the expiration time to 6:00 P.M. 在目前的到期日的當地時間。local time on the current expiration day. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetExpires Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetLastModified(valuetype System.DateTime date) cil managed

span.span: The new value for the header.

summary.span: 將 HTTP 標頭設定為提供的 值。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header to the value supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Last-Modified` HTTP 標頭時間戳記的文件`DateTime`值，指出上次修改文件。The `Last-Modified` HTTP header time stamps the document with the `DateTime` value indicating when the document was last modified. 如果違反了快取的限制性階層，這個方法將會失敗。This method will fail if the caching restrictiveness hierarchy is violated. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定`Last-Modified`的新日期的標頭。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `Last-Modified` header to a new date. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetLastModified Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is later than the current .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetMaxAge(valuetype System.TimeSpan delta) cil managed

param.name: delta
param.span: 用來設定 - 標頭的時間範圍。

span.span: The time span used to set the - header.

summary.span: 根據指定的時段設定 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header based on the specified time span.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Max-age` 已存在，才能被視為過時允許文件的絕對時間上限。`Max-age` is the maximum absolute time a document is allowed to exist before being considered stale. 方法不會使用滑動期限和到期日是否違反限制性原則將會失敗。The method does not use sliding expiration and will fail if the expiration date violates the principle of restrictiveness. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果上的第二個和後續呼叫重複，呼叫方法，您只能減少的最長使用期限值。If the method is called repeatedly, on the second and subsequent calls, the value of the maximum age can only be decreased. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定`Cache-Control: max-age`為 0 小時，30 分鐘的時間和 0 秒的標頭。The following code example demonstrates how to set the `Cache-Control: max-age` header to 0 hours, 30 minutes, and 0 seconds. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetMaxAge Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than one year.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetNoServerCaching() cil managed

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會停止所有原始伺服器對目前回應進行快取。

span.span: Stops all origin-server caching for the current response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 明確拒絕快取的原始伺服器上的文件。Explicitly denies caching of the document on the origin-server. 設定之後，所有文件會完整處理要求。Once set, all requests for the document are fully processed. 叫用這個方法時，快取無法重新啟用對目前回應。When this method is invoked, caching cannot be re-enabled for the current response. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何停用輸出快取的回應的其餘部分。The following code example demonstrates how to disable output caching for the remainder of the response. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoServerCaching Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetNoStore() cil managed

summary.span: 設定 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法的不將回應儲存在其歷程記錄中將用戶端導向的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method of the class to direct the client not to store the responses in its history. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpCachePolicySetNoStore#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetNoStore/CS/httpcachepolicy_setnostorecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpCachePolicySetNoStore#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicySetNoStore/VB/httpcachepolicy_setnostorevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetNoTransforms() cil managed

summary.span: 設定 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Sets the HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP 標頭指示快取不能修改文件的應用程式的網路。The `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP header instructs network caching applications not to modify the document. `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP 標頭可防止下游的 proxy 伺服器變更任何標頭值，指定`Content-Encoding`， `Content-Range`，或`Content-Type`（這包括實體） 的標頭。The `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP header prevents downstream proxy servers from changing any header values specified by the `Content-Encoding`, `Content-Range`, or `Content-Type` headers (this includes the entity body). 比方說，它會防止 proxy GIF 影像轉換為 PNG。For example, it prevents proxies from converting GIF images to PNG. 如同上一次快取其他的限制呼叫時， `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP 標頭不能停用透過介面。As with other restrictions on caching, once is called, the `Cache-Control: no-transform` HTTP header cannot be disabled through the interface. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將傳送`Cache-Control: no-transform`指示詞搭配目前的回應。The following code example demonstrates how to send the `Cache-Control: no-transform` directive with the current response. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetNoTransforms Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetOmitVaryStar(bool omit) cil managed

param.name: omit
param.span: 表示讓 不將 \* 值用於其 屬性，否則為 。

span.span: to direct the to not use the \* value for its property; otherwise, .

summary.span: 指定根據參數變化時，回應是否應包含 標頭。

span.span: Specifies whether the response should contain the header when varying by parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您防止輸出 vary 新增`vary:*`傳出的回應時依參數而異的快取回的應標頭。This method allows you to prevent the output ached from adding a `vary:*` header to the outgoing response when the cached response varies by parameter. 這適合用於不同的查詢字串快取，因為大部分的用戶端會自動因查詢字串而不需要的用戶端`vary:*`標頭。This is useful for clients varying caching by query string because most clients will automatically vary by query string without requiring the `vary:*` header. > [!NOTE] > 使用`vary:*`標頭可以停用所有的用戶端快取。The use of the `vary:*` header can disable all client caching. 這是很便利的方法，以影響屬性。This is a convenience method to affect the property. 傳遞`true`方法會指示要略過 \* 值屬性。Passing `true` to the method directs the to ignore the \* value for the property. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值，這相當於，是傳送未指示詞標頭中，除非明確指定這個方法。The default, which is equivalent to , is to send neither directive in a header unless explicitly specified by this method. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定快取重新驗證為。The following code example demonstrates how to set cache revalidation to . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetSlidingExpiration(bool slide) cil managed

span.span: or .

summary.span: 將快取到期從絕對設為滑動。

span.span: Sets cache expiration to from absolute to sliding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當快取到期時間設為滑動， `Cache-Control` HTTP 標頭將會更新每個回應。When cache expiration is set to sliding, the `Cache-Control` HTTP header will be renewed with each response. 此到期模式等同於將到期標頭新增至相對於目前的時間設定的所有輸出的 [IIS] 組態選項。This expiration mode is identical to the IIS configuration option to add an expiration header to all output set relative to the current time. 如果您明確設定滑動期限為關閉 (`false`)、 將保留該設定，並嘗試啟用滑動期限會以無訊息模式失敗。If you explicitly set sliding expiration to off (`false`), that setting will be preserved and any attempts to enable sliding expiration will silently fail. 這個方法沒有直接對應到 HTTP 標頭。This method does not directly map to an HTTP header. 它由後續的模組或背景工作角色要求用來設定原始伺服器快取原則。It is used by subsequent modules or worker requests to set origin-server cache policy. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定滑動期限至`true`。The following code example demonstrates how to set sliding expiration to `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetSlidingExpiration Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetValidUntilExpires(bool validUntilExpires) cil managed

param.name: validUntilExpires
param.span: 如果快取忽略 失效標頭，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the cache ignores invalidation headers; otherwise, .

summary.span: 指定 ASP.NET 快取是否應忽略使此快取無效之用戶端所傳送的 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: Specifies whether the ASP.NET cache should ignore HTTP headers sent by the client that invalidate the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定為`true`時，自動高階`<%@ OutputCache … %>`頁面指示詞的使用。The method is set to `true` automatically when the high-level `<%@ OutputCache … %>` page directive is used. 這個方法提供，因為某些瀏覽器時重新整理頁面檢視，將 HTTP 快取失效標頭傳送至 Web 伺服器和收回的頁面上，從快取。This method is provided because some browsers, when refreshing a page view, send HTTP cache invalidation headers to the Web server and evict the page from the cache. 當`validUntilExpires`參數是`true`，ASP.NET 會略過快取失效標頭和頁面會保留在快取，直到它到期為止。When the `validUntilExpires` parameter is `true`, ASP.NET ignores cache invalidation headers and the page remains in the cache until it expires. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來指示用戶端傳送的任何快取失效標頭會被忽略。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to instruct that any cache invalidation headers sent by the client are ignored. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires/CS/httpcachepolicy_setvaliduntilexpirescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpCachePolicy_SetValidUntilExpires/VB/httpcachepolicy_setvaliduntilexpiresvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetVaryByCustom(string custom) cil managed

param.name: custom
param.span: 可以區分快取輸出的文字字串。

span.span: The text string to vary cached output by.

summary.span: 指定用來區分快取輸出回應的自訂文字字串。

span.span: Specifies a custom text string to vary cached output responses by.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定 「 Accept-charset"，這會導致選擇其中一個數個快取的回應視瀏覽器的原始伺服器的快取的自訂 vary 字串`Accept-Charset`標頭。The following code example demonstrates how to set the custom vary string to "Accept-Charset", which causes the origin-server's cache to choose one of several cached responses depending on the browser's `Accept-Charset` header. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCachePolicy.SetVaryByCustom Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VaryByContentEncodings As HttpCacheVaryByContentEncodings

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得將用於變更輸出快取的 標頭清單。

span.span: Gets the list of headers that will be used to vary the output cache.

value.span: 指定用來選取快取回應之 標頭的物件。

span.span: An object that specifies which headers are used to select the cached response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回代表壓縮配置，以變更輸出快取的內容編碼標頭的清單。The property returns a list of Content-Encoding headers that represent compression schemes to vary the output cache by. 快取動態壓縮的回應，表示會產生一次，在資源的第一個要求壓縮的成本。Caching dynamically compressed responses means that the cost of compression is incurred only one time, during the first request for the resource. 屬性搭配`Accept-Encoding`的要求，以判斷如何提供不同的內容編碼，動態壓縮的快取回的應標頭。The property is used with the `Accept-Encoding` header of a request to determine how to serve cached responses for different content encodings that are dynamically compressed. Accept-encoding 標頭會列出可在用戶端可以解壓縮的編碼方式。The Accept-Encoding header lists the encodings that the client can decompress. 當您設定內容編碼方式會因快取時，它會讓回應中的值會因間接`Accept-Encoding`標頭。When you set the cache to vary by content encoding, it lets the response vary indirectly by the value in the `Accept-Encoding` header. 當處理要求時，`Accept-Encoding`標頭已核取，且第一個可接受編碼為識別，且用來執行下列動作之一：When a request is processed, the `Accept-Encoding` header is checked and the first acceptable encoding is identified and used to take one of the following actions: - 如果找到相符的編碼方式在清單和快取回的應存在時，快取的回應會傳送。If a matching encoding is found in the list and a cached response exists, the cached response is sent. - 如果找到相符的編碼方式在清單，但快取的回應不存在時，會產生回應，並插入快取。If a matching encoding is found in the list but a cached response does not exist, a response is generated and inserted into the cache. - 如果在找不到相符的編碼 清單中，快取中搜尋非編碼的回應，也稱為身分識別回應。If a matching encoding is not found in the list, the cache is searched for a non-encoded response, also referred to as the identity response. 如果找到非編碼的回應，它會傳送它。If the non-encoded response is found, it is sent. 否則，新的非編碼回應是產生、 傳送，而存放在快取。Otherwise, a new non-encoded response is generated, sent, and stored in the cache. 如需詳細資訊屬性，請參閱 「 RFC 2616:超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1 」 所提供[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information about the property, see "RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1," which is available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 內容編碼的相關資訊位於第 14 節 「 標頭欄位定義 」。Information about content encodings is in section 14, "Header Field Definitions." 您可以設定屬性使用`VaryByContentEncodings`指示詞的屬性。You can set the property by using the `VaryByContentEncodings` attribute of the directive. 您也可以將快取設定檔加入 Web.config 檔案中的項目中。You can also add a cache profile to the element in the Web.config file. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何啟用動態壓縮的頁面，即可從輸出快取提供的回應。The following example shows how to enable a dynamically compressed response for a page to be served from the output cache. 可接受的編碼會是"gzip"，且設定使用`VaryByContentEncodings`指示詞的屬性。The encoding that is acceptable is "gzip" and is set by using the `VaryByContentEncodings` attribute of the directive. 如果主控網頁的網頁伺服器並沒有啟用動態壓縮，輸出快取不會根據指定的內容編碼方式為快取回的應。If the Web server that is hosting the page does not have dynamic compression enabled, the output cache will not have a cached response that is based on the specified content encoding. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/VB/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VaryByHeaders As HttpCacheVaryByHeaders
public: property System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByHeaders ^ VaryByHeaders { System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByHeaders ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得所有將用於區分快取輸出的 HTTP 標頭清單。

span.span: Gets the list of all HTTP headers that will be used to vary cache output.

value.span: ，指定要使用哪些 HTTP 標頭來選取快取回應。

span.span: An that specifies which HTTP headers are used to select the cached response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的項目可以有數個不同的標頭，要求的文件的另一個版本可用時，從快取中的每個 HTTP 標頭類型。When a cached item has several vary headers, a separate version of the requested document is available from the cache for each HTTP header type. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VaryByParams As HttpCacheVaryByParams
public: property System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByParams ^ VaryByParams { System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByParams ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得由 HTTP 或 HTTP 接收之影響快取的參數清單。

span.span: Gets the list of parameters received by an HTTP or HTTP that affect caching.

value.span: ，指定要使用哪些快取控制項標頭來選取快取回應。

span.span: An that specifies which cache-control headers are used to select the cached response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求的文件的另一個版本可從快取中每個具名參數集合。A separate version of the requested document is available from the cache for each named parameter in the collection. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
